concept.title: Preparation of Workspace for Typewriter Maintenance
concept.shortdesc: A clean and well-ventilated work area ensures safe and effective cleaning and maintenance of the typewriter.

ul.li: A well-ventilated space should be selected, ideally one with windows and access to direct sunlight.
Paper towels or plastic sheeting should be laid out to fully cover the work surface.
Nitrile gloves should be worn to prevent mineral spirits, cleaning agents, and waxes from contacting the skin.

conbody.note: Working in a proper ventilated space ensures safety when using cleaning agents and allows for faster drying times when rinsing components.
